Class RatingStory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • servlets.BaseServlet
          • servlets.RatingStory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(description="rates a story submitted",
            urlPatterns="/RatingStory")
public class RatingStory
extends BaseServlet
    Deals with giving a score of a story made by a learner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
